resources.string:
Bring others into your VR experience. Go live on Facebook while you play your favourite game or explore Meta Horizon Worlds.

Add your Facebook account to your Accounts Centre to live-stream on Facebook.
Do you want to end this live-stream now?
"To adjust settings such as audience location and age, edit your Page's live-stream from a web browser."
Choose where to show your live-stream
When your mic is on your recording will include mic audio. You can change this at any time in Camera settings.
When your mic is on, your recording will include mic audio. You can mute your mic at any time in quick settings.
You now have a longer battery life.
"Select the available apps that you'd like to install on your device. You can also choose to install these apps later."
"Some of the apps you've selected won't be installed."
"This content can't be viewed outside your headset."

A blue LED light on your headset will turn on to notify others when colour Pass-through cameras are active. Ask people around you for permission before including them in casting, recordings or live-streaming.

A blinking white LED light on your headset will turn on to notify others when external colour cameras are active and data is being casted, recorded or livestreamed.

Ask people around you for permission before including them in casting, recordings or livestreaming.
To access boundary settings, exit the current MR app.
To access boundary settings, turn on tracking in the Headset tracking section of Settings.
Meta Horizon Workrooms is now in your library. Connect, collaborate and create with coworkers in your own customisable VR workspace.
Pin limit reached. Unpin an app to make space.
Cancelling the install will also uninstall this app. Any saved data on this headset may be deleted.
Messenger is now available in the App Library.
Running apps from unknown sources may put your account and device at risk. Our Platform Abuse Policy also prohibits piracy, illicit modding, cheating and other unauthorised usage.
This can be seen by everyone and changed at any time.
This can be seen by everyone and changed once every six months.
"This feature isn't working at the moment. Please check your Internet connection or try again later."
"Saved data on your device and in the cloud don't match. Would you like to use the data on this device, or the data in the cloud?"
Your device failed to synchronise with the cloud. You can still launch the app, but it may result in lost data or progress.
"After you've picked up your controllers, please return to the centre of your playing area and select Continue."

To use this app, please pick up your controllers and select Continue.

Tip: Pass-through is a feature that lets you see your physical environment with your headset on. You can turn on pass-through now to find your controllers.
"After you've put your controllers down, please return to the centre of your playing area and select Continue."

To use this app, please put your controllers down and select Continue.

Tip: Pass-through is a feature that lets you see your physical environment with your headset on. You can turn on Pass-through now to find a place to put your controllers down.
You can now manage multiple windows of the same app using the universal menu.
Visit Settings at any time to adjust your syncing and recording preferences.
"To help Meta understand and resolve the problem, information about your device, account and the apps you're currently running will be automatically included in this report."
Sorry, an error occurred while submitting your report

Please double-check your mute button, app microphone permission settings, party chat mic switcher and include in your report as many details as you can and whether this problem only occurs when you use party chat, Assistant, a specific app, all apps etc.
Describe what went wrong and how you encountered the problem.
Your admin will also receive the report and may submit a support ticket for help resolving the issue.
"Updating to the latest software version may fix the problem you're experiencing."
An error occurred while creating VRS recording preview
VRS recording preview is unavailable because no SLAM streams were captured
VRS recording upload for VRSRewind failed. Please contact vrs_rewind oncall.
1. Make sure that you are in a well-lit room
1. Make sure that you are in a well-lit room
1. In settings, verify that you are opted in to hands and auto-transitions are on
2. Make sure that you put down both controllers on a hard stable surface
3. If issue persists, turn off auto-transitions and use the Hands button in quick settings to transition
1. In settings, turn off double-tap, which may cause unintended transitions
2. If issue persists, turn off auto-transitions in Settings and use the Hands button in quick settings to transition
Send a link to my email address
② When prompted, enter the code below
Enter your 6-digit end-to-end encryption PIN to remove end-to-end encryption for your cloud backup. Learn more
"Choose a 6-digit PIN to use for end-to-end encryption. It should be something that you'll remember. Learn more"
Move your thumbstick along the edge of the circle three times.
Press your thumbstick forwards to see how accurately it moves forwards.
Press your thumbstick forwards three times.
Before calibrating, press your thumbstick forwards to see how accurately it moves forwards.
Hold , then press and hold the right trigger to start and stop recording.
To quickly take a photo, hold , then press the right controller trigger.
"You've reached the end of your allowed time for today. Your parent can extend your time in Family Centre or the Meta Quest app."

"We have updated the Hand and Body Privacy Notice (formerly the Hand Tracking Privacy Notice) to help you better understand how hand and body tracking allows you to interact with your surroundings, have a more seamless or immersive experience, and make your avatar's movements look more realistic. By continuing to use this feature, you agree to these updates."

"We have updated the Hand and Body Privacy Notice (formerly the Hand Tracking Privacy Notice) to help you better understand how hand and body tracking allows you to interact with your surroundings, have a more seamless or immersive experience, and make your avatar's movements look more realistic. By continuing to use this feature, you acknowledge these updates."

"Hand and body tracking allows you to switch between hands and controllers to interact with your surroundings and have a more seamless or immersive experience. It also helps make your avatar's movements look more realistic.

Enabling this feature allows your headset to collect data about your hand and body poses, and estimated hand size and body scale, as explained in the Hand and Body Privacy Notice. You can turn off hand and body tracking at any time in Settings."
Cast your VR experience to your television or Quest mobile app
This will end your cast to web and stop showing your YouTube live chat. If you are streaming on YouTube, this will not end your stream.
"Describe what you liked or didn't like, or something that went wrong."
Would you like to send follow requests to all of the people you recently met in %1$s?
"We won't tell %1$s that they were removed from your followers."
"To start a new one, you'll have to leave the call that you are in."
You can enable it again at any time in Settings.

Space Sense helps you move around the virtual world without bumping into people and things in the real world.
  • See outlines of things that are directly in front of your headset and big enough to detect.
  • Choose the range that Space Sense covers within your Roomscale boundary.
Always stay aware of your surroundings, even when Space Sense is on. You can turn this feature on or off in Physical space settings.
Please try again from a joinable destination
Horizon Worlds is now in your library. Explore more than 10,000 VR worlds, play games with friends and build unforgettable new experiences.
"We've made it easier for you to access some of the top recommended Meta Horizon worlds! Take a look below."
"If you stop casting, you'll no longer be able to see your live chat in VR. This will not end your stream on YouTube."
Cast to a browser and see your live chat in VR. If your cast ends, it will not affect your stream.
Stream directly to the platform. All you need is your headset.
There is stream fail during live-streaming. Tap to start your live-stream again.
Cast to your private link (oculus.com/casting) and view in a supported web browser such as Google Chrome.
Go to oculus.com/casting on your computer within 60 seconds. Make sure that you use a supported browser such as Google Chrome.
Your Headset Is Ready to Cast
Open this link in a supported web browser such as Google Chrome. Make sure that your computer is on the same Wi-Fi network as your headset.

"

Your organisation has disabled access to the Meta Quest Store. You won't be able to download or access any apps you've downloaded from it using a Meta account managed by your organisation. Learn more

"
Your organisation controls your access to the Meta Quest Store. Access to the Store can be enabled or disabled at any time.

"

You don't have access to this feature because it was blocked by your organisation.

"

"

You can't make purchases because your organisation disabled access to the Meta Quest Store.
Learn more

"

Your organisation disabled social features and interactions.
Learn more
Social features and interactions include the Meta Horizon Worlds app, parties, messaging, calling, travelling and more.

"

Workrooms can't be used with this account as it's managed by your organisation. You can use Workrooms with a Meta account managed by you, if your admin has allowed it.

"

"Turn on syncing to your Meta Quest mobile app so that you can share your VR photos and short videos directly from your phone.

Media synced to your mobile app won't take up space on your phone, and you can turn this off at any time in settings."

"Photos and short videos you capture in VR now automatically sync to your Meta Quest mobile app so that you can share directly from your phone.

Media synced to your mobile app won't take up space on your phone, and you can turn this off at any time in your settings."
Sync this VR media to your phone?
"This feature can't be used at the moment because it's been blocked."
"You can't use this feature at the moment"
"You can't access this app at the moment"

Ask your parent to enter this code at
%1$s

Or you can send them a link using your phone by clicking below.

Update to the latest version of the Meta Quest app in order to set up parental supervision.

"

Invite a parent or guardian to support your Meta account.

Once your parent has accepted, they can:
• See how much time you spend in VR and set time limits.
• See which apps you use and your purchases, downloads and gifts.
• See your followers and who you're following in VR.
• Allow or block your access to apps, purchases and features.
• View and control the safety settings of some apps, including Meta Horizon Worlds.

How we protect your privacy:
• Only you can choose the way you appear in VR.
• Only you can do things such as delete your account or change your password.

You can disconnect from your parent at any time.

To allow this support, select Continue.

"
"You can't use this app at the moment"
"You've reached the end of your allowed time for today. Your parent can extend your time in Family Centre or the Meta Quest app."
"Features with social interactions outside of apps can't be used at the moment because they've been blocked."
Your Headset Is Not Connected to the Internet
To receive phone notifications on your headset, go to your headset settings in the Meta Quest app and select Phone notifications.
Receive phone notifications on your headset

Make sure that this code is shown in the Quest PC app.

%1$s
Pairing was cancelled from your PC. Please try pairing your PC again.
"Please ensure that no other headsets are connected to your PC, then try again. If you're still having trouble, try restarting your headset, or restart the Quest PC app in Settings > Beta."

Air Link is an early-access feature that is in development and will continue to improve. Performance will vary greatly based on your PC specs and network conditions.

Requirements:
• Only use Air Link on a secure Wi-Fi network that you trust
• Use a 5 GHz network on an AC or AX wireless router connected to your PC with an ethernet cable
• Make sure that your PC meets the Quest Link requirements

The following are known to cause performance issues:
• Using a PC connected wirelessly to your network
• Using a mesh or 2.4 GHz network
Bad connectivity. Please try again later.
An error occurred while trying to start an Avalanche session. Please check your network and try again.
Open File Viewer app to adjust
Please connect at least four dots.
Allows the dialogue consumer apps to enforce this permission on the broadcast receivers to only be dismissed by dialogue framework.
Logitech MX Keys Mini Pale Grey (ISO)
Logitech MX Keys Mini for Mac Pale Grey (ISO)
Logitech MX Keys for Mac Space Grey (ANSI)
Logitech MX Keys Mini for Mac Pale Grey (ANSI)
Logitech MX Keys Mini Pale Grey (ANSI)

By submitting feedback, you agree to share the information submitted (including information about that app, your user ID and device, and system information) with Meta and the developer of this application. You agree to the Meta Terms of Service and the Supplemental Meta Platforms Technologies Terms of Service. The information submitted will be subject to the Meta Privacy Policy and the Supplemental Meta Platforms Technologies Privacy Policy.

Set up Meta Quest Move and share your Move stats to the Sharecare app to participate in the Sharecare programme. How it works 1. Set up Move to start tracking Move stats such as calories burned and Move minutes in VR. 2. Sync your Move stats with Meta servers in headset to enable sharing of your Move stats. 3. Finish setup and share your Move stats with Sharecare from the Sharecare app. Data & privacy Reminder • Your Meta Quest 2 device and Meta account have been associated with the Sharecare programme. You may see unique experiences or ads based on this. • Sharecare cannot see your fitness activity unless you allow access after setting up Meta Quest Move.
Choose the apps you want to show on your profile as favourites. You can change who sees this at any time in Settings.
"You don't have any favourite apps yet."
You can send an invitation once your location is joinable
"You used to have the same Meta Horizon username as someone else. We've created a new one for you to make sure that people don't get the two of you confused."
Access Rift apps while your Quest is plugged into your PC. You can enable/disable this from your quick settings at any time
Make sure that the Oculus PC app is open and that your PC and headset are connected to the same local network, then try again.
Make sure that the Oculus PC app is open and that your PC and headset are connected to the same local network, then try again.
Session timed out. Check the network connection on your headset, then try again
Something went wrong. Check the network connection on your headset, then try again
Quest Link cannot be launched because your headset and Oculus PC app are not compatible. Please update them to the latest software version, then try again.
"You've returned to your Quest home menu. Unplug your headset and plug it back in if you want to re-enable Quest Link."
Make sure that the USB cable is plugged into your headset and into a USB 3 port on your computer. The Oculus app on your PC also needs to be running.
"You've returned to your Quest home menu. Unplug your headset and plug it back in if you want to re-enable Quest Link."
"You've returned to your Quest home menu. Unplug your headset and plug it back in if you want to re-enable Quest Link."
Operating system out of date; update and try again.
Make sure that your headset is connected to a PC running the Quest PC app.
Make sure that the Quest PC app is open, and that your PC and headset are connected to the same network.
"This app can't use your natural facial expressions data. Manage in Settings."
To use Pass-through, turn on boundary in the Developer section of Settings.
To use Pass-through, turn on tracking in the Headset tracking section of Settings.

Travel mode helps your headset work on aeroplanes so that you can work and play while travelling.

Remember to stay seated, take breaks for comfort and be considerate of others around you.
Natural facial expressions are paused for your headset.
Natural facial expressions are unpaused for your headset.
Use the volume buttons on your headset to highlight factory reset and press the power button.

"By blocking someone, they:



• Can't follow you or send you a follow request

• Can't send you messages

• Can't invite you to events, games or parties

• Won't see your profile in search



This person won't be notified that you've blocked them. We may share this info with apps that you use."
"Your behaviour didn't follow our policy on bullying and harassment"
"Your behaviour didn't follow our policy on child exploitation, abuse and nudity"
"Your behaviour didn't follow our policy on dangerous orgs and individuals"

"Although we determined that they didn't violate our policies, we encourage you to continue reporting behaviour or content that makes you feel unsafe or uncomfortable.



We recommend that you block %2$s if you want to avoid them in the future."
"Although we determined that they didn't violate our policies, we encourage you to continue reporting behaviour or content that makes you feel unsafe or uncomfortable."
We are reviewing their behaviour against our policies.
We reviewed their behaviour against our policies.
"We determined that you didn't follow our policy on bullying and harassment"
"We determined that you didn't follow our policy on child exploitation, abuse and nudity"
"We determined that you didn't follow our policy on dangerous orgs and individuals"

"We determined that you didn't follow our policies"
"We determined that you didn't follow our policy on graphic violence"
"Once you've removed %1$s, you'll no longer be able to chat with, call or meet them in app."
"If you'd like to chat with, call and meet %1$s in app, send your parent or guardian a request to approve them for contact."
Create a pattern using at least four dots. This pattern can be used to manage access to your headset, apps and more. You can manage this later in Settings.
"Forgotten patterns can't be recovered. If you forget your pattern, you may need to factory reset your headset. Learn more"
"Choose a 4-16 digit passcode that you'll remember. Forgotten passcodes can't be recovered. Learn more"
Create a %1$s-digit PIN so that you can access the device, even if you take a break. This PIN will only be shown to and used by you, and it will only last for this session.
Receive notifications from your phone on your headset. To support this feature, information such as the content of your phone notifications will be temporarily stored on your headset. Learn more
Increase your display refresh rate to 120 Hz when requested by supported apps. This may affect battery usage, headset temperature and the visual quality of some system features.
"Help improve Meta Quest by reporting any problems that you're experiencing"

"When your headset is powered off and charging, it will briefly power on to apply available app updates and power off when updates are complete. You may hear your headset's fans during this process. Your microphone and cameras will always remain off until you put your headset on and press the power button. Learn more."

"This device is managed by administrator through agent %1$s. The administrator can monitor and manage apps and data associated with this device, including settings, permissions, corporate access, network activity and the device's location information."
Please keep your headset on and charged to at least %1$d%%. Your headset will automatically restart after the update is complete.
The device must have at least 1 MB free to be updated.
The device must be plugged in to begin the update. Please plug in the device before starting the update.
Customise the text size and colours of your captions
Headset tracking must be turned on in order to use this feature.
"Other people in calls and apps won't hear your voice commands, but they may hear you say \"%1$s\". Use controller shortcut for wake by touch."
Double-press to use voice commands
Double-press the button to wake %1$s for voice commands.
Enables desk mode for this device, allowing you to use the Assistant while your device is sleeping
Double-press the button to use voice commands in apps. If this setting is off and \"%1$s\" is turned on, you can still say that to use voice commands in apps.
Double-press the button or say \"%1$s\" to use voice commands in apps. If this is off, you can still say \"%1$s\" to use voice commands in apps.

"When this is turned off, your voice interactions won't be stored. Any previous voice interactions will still be stored – you can view, hear or delete them at any time. A trained team may review a sample to make our voice services smarter and more accurate. Learn More"
Store recordings of what you say to Voice commands.
Store a text copy and related data of what you say to Voice commands.

Voice commands uses what you say to it and related data about how you use it to respond to your commands. Voice commands will process recordings of your voice and transcribe them into text, as explained in the privacy notice.
After the headset display turns off (see above), your headset will enter sleep mode after a set period of time

"Automatically switch to hands after putting your controllers down on a stable surface. To switch back, pick up your controllers. If this setting is turned off, you'll need to switch manually using the hand tracking button in quick settings."
A low auto-switch sensitivity means that it will take longer to switch to hands when you put your controllers down.
Balance the brightness between the centre and edges of your display for a more even appearance.
Your headset will play a brief audio notification when the battery is either fully charged or critical low (5%% or less)
"Increase your height to experience apps more comfortably, even while seated. You'll have to turn this feature on again if you reset your boundary. This setting works in most apps."
"Choose which eye's perspective to capture when recording video"
Choose how much to reduce the appearance of headset movement in videos. Increasing stabilisation will decrease the recorded field of view.
When you begin charging your device, play a short tone to indicate that your device is now charging
Choose from one of the preinstalled images or upload your own. For best results, choose a 360-degree PNG or JPG image. Learn more
Apply a display filter to make colours easier to distinguish
Set the forwards direction of your thumbsticks.
"Enhance your selected virtual environment with a 360-degree skybox image to personalise your Home's surroundings."
Your device may not remember previous environments, and you may need to redraw boundaries. Once you delete, this information it cannot be recovered.
Check your Internet connection and try again.
By selecting Acknowledge, you accept the risks and agree to follow the instructions above.
Avoid having the proximity sensor disabled for prolonged periods of time to prevent burn-in, reduce overheating risk and minimise increased power consumption.
Automatically start a Quest Link session when your headset connects via USB or Wi-Fi to a paired PC running the Quest PC app.
Custom settings enable you to develop apps on your VR headset using customised settings.
"This headset is managed by your organisation and some settings can't be changed. Contact your organisation's admin for details."
Back up app data to the cloud. Only data for supported apps will be backed up. If this setting is turned off, data from supported apps on this headset will no longer be backed up. Learn more
"Any natural facial expressions data on your headset will be deleted, and your permissions will be reset. You'll need to enable natural facial expressions if you want to use this feature again."
"Changes you've made will not be saved."
Share your gaming activity with Discord. See and join what other people are playing on Discord. This is controlled by your privacy settings. Learn more.
"Silence notifications in specific areas of VR. You'll still receive time-sensitive updates, such as party invitations and low battery notifications."
Secure cloud backups with end-to-end encryption so that no one else, not even Meta, can see and access them.

You need to wait 30 minutes to try again. You have five more tries to enter the correct end-to-end encryption PIN before your cloud backup will be deleted. This will remove all cloud app data from your account.
"Are you worried you'll forget your PIN? Go to the Meta Quest app, open Settings and go to Backup to use your phone as a recovery device."
Set up your phone as a recovery device so that you can reset your end-to-end encryption PIN if you forget it. In the Meta Quest app, open Settings and then go to Back-up.
"Your avatar's hands and arms will be shown instead of transparent hands while using your headset. This will not affect how your avatar appears in your mirror or to others."
This environment customisation will be uninstalled.
Go to Physical space settings to adjust Pass-through and switch between your real-world surroundings and virtual environment. You can also switch in Quick settings.
Inside your home space and all apps and games
Bear in mind that experimental features may stop working at any time. Please enable these features with caution, as they may increase your risk of injury or property damage.
Looking down at an angle will make your boundary appear on the floor so that you can see where you are in your playing area
Connected experiences across Meta technologies, such as Facebook, Instagram and Meta Quest
Natural facial expressions, eye tracking, hand tracking
Go to Experimental features > Bring your table into VR or bring your sofa into VR to create MR furniture. You can select the style here.
Audience and visibility, social connections, safety and legal
Change the colour of your boundary. Please choose a colour you can see clearly when your boundary appears in VR to alert you.

Boundary, Pass-through and Space setup help maintain physical safety and can only be disabled for content development purposes. By selecting Acknowledge, you accept the risks inherent in disabling Physical space features, and agree to re-enable before any other use.
Boundary, Pass-through and Space setup can only be disabled for development purposes.
Double-tap controllers against each other to switch to hand tracking. To transition back to controllers, pick them up and press any button.

"Allows you to switch between hands and controllers, have a more seamless or immersive experience and make your avatar's movements look more realistic. When enabled, your headset collects data about your hand and body poses, and estimated hand size and body scale, as explained in the Hand and Body Privacy Notice."
Use your hands as controllers. If you use hand tracking, your headset estimates your hand size and collects information about your hand pose, as explained in the Hands Privacy Notice.
Choose the range that Space Sense covers within your roomscale boundary. The close setting means that only things near you are visible.
"See outlines of people and things within your roomscale boundary to increase your awareness of what's directly in front of your headset while you're in VR"
Customise controller key mapping for your profile. Please note that some apps may still refer to the default button map.
Your voice dictation data will be stored on your device, and only aggregated information will be shared with Meta to improve dictation for everyone. Learn more.
Your voice dictation data will be stored on your device, and only aggregated modelling information will be shared with Meta to improve dictation for everyone. Learn more.

If you enable this setting, keystroke data will be stored on your device, and only aggregated information from your device will be shared with Meta to improve the keyboard experience for everyone. Learn more.

If you enable this setting, keystroke data will be stored on your device, and only aggregated modelling information from your device will be shared with Facebook to improve the keyboard experience for everyone

Changes to your Quest software may not take effect immediately after you leave the Public Test Channel. If your headset has already been updated to an early version of Quest software, it will continue to run this version until the next public release.

You may join the Public Test Channel again in the future, unless program enrolment is full.
Require a long press to pause an app to prevent accidental presses during game play. This disables long press to reset view.
"Find a comfortable and stable position and look up. Then, press and hold to recentre your view. This feature is for low-intensity experiences that don't require a lot of movement."
Because your organisation manages this device, you cannot add accounts
Show an outline and glow around your hands while Pass-through is on. This can help you see your hand movement by providing more contrast.
Show hand outline while Pass-through is enabled
Please make sure that your headset is connected to the Internet, then give your headset and controllers to the other person so that they can set up their account.
"The headset is getting ready for another account. This may take a moment. If you haven't already, now is a good time to give the headset and controllers to the person whose account is being added."
There was a problem with sending the invitation. Please try again later.
We sent an email with an invitation link to %1$s. The link will expire in 15 minutes.
"You already have app sharing enabled on another headset. To share apps on this headset, you'll need to disable app sharing on the other headset first."
You can go to your devices dashboard to manage your devices.
"If you can't access the other headset, visit the Meta Store Help Centre for more info."
You can stop sharing apps at any time from your account settings.
"We weren't able to connect to the service. Please check your Internet connection."
You can stop sharing apps at any time from your account settings.
You can stop sharing apps at any time from your account settings.
Add up to three additional people on this device. Admins can manage settings and permissions for other accounts. Learn more
Add other people to your Meta Quest so that they can have their own apps and settings.
"Turn on app sharing so that other people can use your purchased apps on this device. They'll need to install any shared apps, but the apps won't take up more space."
Switch between accounts by clicking your profile picture in the universal menu. Manage the other accounts and your unlock pattern in your settings.
Get Started With Device and App Sharing
Please make sure that your headset is connected to the Internet to continue.
Select your account when the headset restarts or goes to sleep
Activity and account information from other accounts could be visible to the organisation that manages this headset. The organisation can also remove additional accounts.
This device is missing a device identity. Please visit fburl.com/oc_device_identity for help.
Temporarily pause eye tracking. You can unpause this feature at any time.
Temporarily pause natural facial expressions. You can unpause this feature at any time.
Change your display to warmer colours, which may be easier on your eyes
"To start tracking your calories and move minutes in VR, you'll need to turn on the Move app"
Double-tap the left- or right-hand side of your headset to turn Pass-through on or off
Turn on Pass-through to see your physical surroundings
Natural facial expressions are not enabled for your headset

"Location services use sources such as crowdsourced Wi-Fi hotspots to determine your device's location. Turning location services on lets you give apps permission to access your device's location data. Learn more"

"Location services use sources such as crowdsourced Wi-Fi hotspots to determine your device's location. Turning location services on lets you give apps permission to access your device's location data. The organisation who manages this headset will have access to location services even if this setting is off. Learn more"
Choose which interactive objects appear in your home. When available, these objects help you discover features and experiences.
Apps will appear here when you first receive notifications from them on your headset.
Choose which notifications you want to receive.
"Choose which notifications you want to receive and when you'll see them in VR."
To receive phone notifications on your headset, go to your headset settings in the Meta Quest app and select Phone notifications.
Go to Permissions to adjust point cloud data sharing options.
Choose to share usage data and crash reports from the browser and web apps to improve Meta Quest Browser. Learn more.
"Take a look at your current settings and check that they're set the way you want them."
Usage history shows which apps and system services accessed your microphone, location, eye tracking and natural facial expressions in the past seven days Learn more
Timeline of when this app accessed your %1$s in the past 7 days. Learn more
Please check your Internet connection and try again.
You can show or hide your ownership, activity and Active Status for specific apps.
Choose to share additional data about how you use your headset and controllers to help Meta to better personalise your experiences and improve Meta Quest products for everyone. Learn more

"By unblocking someone, they'll be able to: · Follow you or send you a follow request · Send you messages · Invite you to events, games or parties · See your profile in search This person won't be notified that you've unblocked them. You can block them at any time from their profile. We may share this info with apps that you use."
Are you sure that you want to unblock %1$s?

Add travel mode to Quick settings so that you can turn it on and off while on the go. Travel mode helps your headset work on aeroplanes so that you can interact, work and play in your headset while travelling.

Avoid having the proximity sensor disabled for prolonged periods of time to prevent burn-in, reduce overheating risk and minimise increased power consumption. By selecting Acknowledge, you accept the risks inherent in disabling the proximity sensor and agree to re-enable proximity sensor before any other use.

Your cloud backup is end-to-end encrypted. Enter your PIN to restore your cloud backup to this device. Learn more
Specify where the walls and other objects in your room are located to use apps that blend your virtual and real-world environments. Review which apps can access this data in App permissions.
"A lower controller distance means that your controller will be closer to a boundary edge before you're alerted"
"A lower controller speed sensitivity means that you'll be alerted less during faster movement near a boundary edge"
"A lower headset distance means that your headset will be closer to a boundary edge before you're alerted"
"A lower headset speed sensitivity means that you'll be alerted less during faster movement near a boundary edge"
"A lower boundary sensitivity means that you'll be alerted less when moving faster and closer to a boundary edge. This may increase your risk of injury or damage."
Your popular searches will be reset. You may see new popular searches as you search for more things.
Make sure that your keywords are spelled correctly or try different search terms.

Free up memory by clearing out your Cached media section in Meta Quest TV. The media items will still be available to view in Meta Quest TV without caching.

"The apps that you've selected will be uninstalled from your library. Any saved data or games may be permanently lost. You can reinstall these apps at any time. These apps may still have access to info that you've previously shared, but can't make additional requests for private info. You can contact the developers for more information."
"The environments you've selected will be uninstalled from your Library. If you uninstall your current home environment, the default environment will appear instead."

"This app will be uninstalled from your library. Any saved data or games may be permanently lost. You can reinstall this app at any time. The app may still have access to info that you previously shared, but can't make additional requests for private info. You can contact the developer for more information."
This environment will be uninstalled from your Library. If it was your current home environment, the default environment will appear instead.
Remove all information about your room, including your walls, furniture and other objects.

You can turn travel mode on or off at any time from Quick settings. Use travel mode on planes to continue enjoying your headset while travelling.

With natural facial expressions, enjoy features that allow you to represent yourself more naturally in VR, such as giving your avatar more realistic facial expressions. If you enable natural facial expressions, your headset will process data about your facial movements and expressions, as explained in the Natural Facial Expressions Privacy Notice. You can always adjust which apps have permission to access and use this data from app settings.
You can create one unlock pattern to log in to your headset, use saved passwords and access locked apps and other information on your device
A 4-16 digit passcode to unlock your headset, enter saved passwords and more. This is different from your Meta Quest PIN, which is used for Meta Quest Store purchases.
You can require an unlock passcode to log in to your headset and access saved passwords and other information.
When your mic is on, your recording will include mic audio

Turn on storage in Voice commands settings to see activity here.
You have no stored voice activity.

Start a voice command with the \"%1$s\" wake word. When this setting is on and your mic is on, voice commands will be ready when you say \"Hey Facebook\". Restart required. Learn more
Say \"%1$s\" to wake %2$s for voice commands. When you turn this on, your mic will be on and %2$s will be ready for your commands when you say \"%1$s\".
Start a voice command with the \"%1$s\" wake word. When this setting is on and your mic is on, voice commands will be ready when you say \"Hey Facebook\". Restart required. Learn more
Say \"%1$s\" to wake %2$s for voice commands. When you turn this on, your mic will be on and %2$s will be ready for your commands when you say \"%1$s\".

Focus your headset gaze on a voice interactive app to use Voice Interactions. Microphone activation is shown by a microphone icon and a countdown. At the end of the countdown, your microphone is turned on to record your voice command.

When stored, recordings, transcripts and related data may be used to improve voice commands. Voice commands can use machine learning and trained reviewers to process the data to make voice commands smarter and more accurate.

If you enable voice commands storage, your data will be used as explained in the privacy notice. You can turn off storage at any time and view or delete your data stored in Voice activity. If you choose not to store data you can still use voice commands.
"Your changes couldn't be saved. Please check your Internet connection and try again."
Choose whether you want to store voice recordings, transcripts and related data to improve voice commands.
View and manage your account information in Accounts Centre. Go to work.meta.com/profile on a phone or computer provided by your organisation to access Accounts Centre.
Use the Meta button on your wrist to summon system actions

Make sure that you are signed in to the same account on your headset and the Meta Quest app and that you have Wi-Fi and Bluetooth enabled on your headset and phone.
Make sure that your Bluetooth is on and your phone and headset are connected to the Internet. Once casting starts, you can use your phone to mirror your TV.
Open your Meta Quest mobile app and tap the cast button to start casting. Once casting starts, you can use your phone to mirror your screen to your TV for a larger view.
You can send an invitation once your location is joinable
See a virtual version of your keyboard model while using it in home. You can manage this in tracked keyboard settings.

"Hand and body tracking allows you to switch between hands and controllers to interact with your surroundings and have a more seamless or immersive experience. It also helps make your avatar's movements look more realistic.

Enabling this feature allows your headset to collect data about your hand and body poses, and estimated hand size and body scale, as explained in the Hand and Body Privacy Notice. You can turn off hand and body tracking at any time in Settings."
You can share your latest photo directly from VR.
You can share your latest video directly from VR.
Reset your position by selecting Settings from the universal menu, then select Reset view.

If your router is not broadcasting a network ID, but you would like to connect to it in the future, you can set the network as hidden. This may create a security risk because your device will regularly broadcast its signal to find the network. Setting the network as hidden will not change your router settings.
Automatically connected via network rating provider

Tap to renew subscription and connect

Weak signal. Try moving closer to the router.

Make sure that your controller is powered on and in Bluetooth pairing mode. Once it appears in the list, select it to continue.
